pageContext.claim: “Then they ask [FBI Director Chris Wray] about Antifa. What do you think about Antifa? ‘Well, it's an ideology.’ I said, ‘No, it's not ideo -- It's a bunch of thugs and anarchists that are being funded by somebody and find out who the somebody is.’ It's unbelievable.”
pageContext.analysis: Wray accurately testified to Congress that Antifa is more "an ideology than an organization." Law enforcement officials say there is no single "Antifa" group that is able to raise money or direct members. Instead, many disparate actors call themselves "Antifa" and participate in public disruptions.
